Description:
Danat Al Uloom International School is looking for Amercian and British English teachers for the academic year 2023 - 2024Teacher should be able to:Execute lessons efficiently using different styles of teaching depending on the content.
Acquaint students with the spellings and meanings of complex and straightforward words.
Boost the vocabulary of students by introducing them to varied terms, along with their spellings and meanings.
Diversify students' grasp on the English language by apprising them of the spelling and meaning of words.Skills
Skills:
The ability to execute lessons with meaning, in a fun, and engaging manner.
Infusing each lesson with a dash of innovation to maintain the students' interest.
Exposure to English from a young age.
Computer savvy with fluency in communication.
